data.title: Salesforce.com Program Manager, Customer Foundation
data.meta_description: Careers that Change Lives We seek out and hire a diverse workforce at every level: We need fresh ideas and inclusive insights to continue to be an...
data.text:
Must Have: Minimum Requirements

Bachelors degree required

Minimum of 5 years of relevant experience, or advanced degree with a minimum of 3 years of relevant experience

Nice to Have

Master's in business, finance, technical discipline, public health or similar

Knowledge of the neurovascular and/or related interventional vascular business; medical device and/or life sciences sector experience

Broad experience across multiple functions with evidence of previous project management experience with minimal oversight/direction

Results-oriented, positive, enthusiastic attitude that can set strategies, tactics and action plans

Influencing and partnering with others inside and outside the organization

Comfortable leading and facilitating groups during change efforts

Experience using Salesforce.com and related customer experience and management software platforms

Salesforce.com Certified Administrator

Proficient with Microsoft Office including Excel, Project, Visio and PowerPoint

Basic understanding of data platforms and analytics
